HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Start.message:
Welcome to the Corridor of Champions. It costs 10 Scarabs to play.

Would you like to play? Yes No thanks

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Instructions.message: Just dodge the moving walls, smash all the statues, then make it to the exit within the time limit.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Choose.message: Which gauntlet would you like to attempt?<N>  <B 1> Gauntlet 1<N>  <B 2> Gauntlet 2<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Choose2.message: Which gauntlet would you like to attempt?<N>  <B 1> Gauntlet 1<N>  <B 2> Gauntlet 2<N>  <B 3> Gauntlet 3<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_NotReady.message: You're not ready for that yet.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Fail.message: Sorry, you failed this time. Try again.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Succeed.message: Well done! You completed it in a time of <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_WallDodge_Time> seconds<END FC>! That's a new record!<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Succeed1.message: You deserve a reward for that effort.<N>You win <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_MGWalls_Prize> Scarabs<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Succeed2.message: What an outstanding time that is!<N>Your prize money is <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_MGWalls_Prize> Scarabs<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Succeed_HighScore1.message:
Not bad - you completed it in a time of seconds. But you could do better...

Your fastest time is seconds.

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Succeed_HighScore2.message:
Not bad - you completed it in a time of seconds. But you could do better...

Your fastest time is seconds.

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Succeed_HighScore3.message:
That was okay - you completed it in a time of seconds. But you could improve...

Your fastest time is seconds.

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_HighScores.message: <DP><DHP><END TT><CNTR>Gauntlet 1: <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_WallDodge_HighScore_1><END FC><N>Gauntlet 2: <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_WallDodge_HighScore_2><END FC><N>Gauntlet 3: <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_WallDodge_HighScore_3><END FC><E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_Test.message:
Welcome to the Corridor of Champions.

Here, true heroes can test their abilities. Do you want to pit yourself against our gauntlet? Yes No

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_TestYes.message: A brave and noble choice! However, before you can proceed, you must complete a small test.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_TestYesPearl.message: Return that <FC 0,128,0>Diamond<END FC> behind the fence to me within <FC 0,128,0>20 seconds<END FC>, and you will have proven yourself capable of the gauntlet.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_TestNo.message: Very well, the <FC 128,64,0>Corridor of Champions<END FC> is not for all.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_TestComplete.message: Excellent, you have passed the test.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_TestFail.message: It is quite clear that you are not ready to face the gauntlet. Return when you have gained the skill to retrieve the <FC 0,128,0>Diamond<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_TestInProgress.message: You've only got a few seconds left!<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_TestGiveUp.message: If you cannot complete the test, you cannot attempt the gauntlet. Come back when you think you can succeed... <E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_NoMoney.message: What are you trying to pull? You don't have 10 <FC 0,128,0>Scarabs<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_MG_WallDodge_GameComplete.message:
You mastered the gauntlet! You are a true champion!

Here is the Medal of Champions, awarded only to those who manage to beat the gauntlet.

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_Start.message:
Welcome to Tefnut's Target Tavern. It costs 10 Scarabs to play.

Would you like to play? Yes No thanks

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_Instructions.message: Shoot the targets to earn points. Hitting the skulls causes very bad things... you will lose points and time if this happens.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_Won.message:
Not too bad. You hit a lot of the targets.

You've done better than points before, though.

As a prize for your score, here's Scarabs. Feel free to try again if you think you can do better.

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_Won_HighScore.message:
You achieved a new high score with points! Your score will be added to the wall chart for posterity.

As a prize for such a great high score, here's Scarabs!

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_Lost.message: Pah! That was truly abysmal! <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Shooting_CurrScore> points<END FC> is pathetic! Maybe you need some more practice?<E>

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_LostSingle.message: Pah! That was truly abysmal! <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Shooting_CurrScore> point<END FC> is pathetic! Maybe you need some more practice?<E>

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_HighScores.message: <DP><DHP><END TT>Your best score is: <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Shooting_Score1> points<END FC>!

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_NoMoney.message: I said <FC 0,128,0>10 Scarabs<END FC>, that's not <FC 0,128,0>10 Scarabs<END FC>! You don't have enough, do you?<E>

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_GameComplete.message: You have proven your mastery of the <FC 0,128,0>Blowpipe<END FC>! It is my pleasure to present you with the <FC 0,128,0>Marksman Medal<END FC>. Well done.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Shooting_WinInstructions.message: To prove your mastery of the <FC 0,128,0>Blowpipe<END FC> and earn the <FC 0,128,0>Marksman Medal<END FC>, you must score <FC 0,128,0>40 points<END FC> or more.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Start.message:
Welcome to the mystical game of sequences, stranger. In my shrine you will be tested in your ability to remember patterns of sound and colour.

Would you like to play? Yes No

HT_Text_MG_Simon_StartEasy.message:
Welcome to the mystical sequence game. For the reasonable price of 5 Scarabs, you may test your skills in my magical shrine.

Would you like to play? Yes No

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Choose1.message: What level of skill would you like to test in my magical shrine?<N>  <B 1> Beginner - <FC 0,128,0>5 Scarabs<END FC><N>  <B 2> Intermediate - <FC 0,128,0>10 Scarabs<END FC><E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Choose2.message: What level of skill would you like to test in the shrine?<N>  <B 1> Beginner - <FC 0,128,0>5 Scarabs<END FC><N>  <B 2> Intermediate - <FC 0,128,0>10 Scarabs<END FC><N>  <B 3> Expert - <FC 0,128,0>20 Scarabs<END FC><E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Instructions.message:
Walk down the walkway to the centre platform. Try and remember the sequence that appears before you.

Copy the sequence to win.You can view each sequence again by jumping on the centre platform, but only once.

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Fail.message: No, no, no, that wasn't right at all! You've failed this time.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Succeed.message: Well done! You passed round <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Simon_Round><END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Win.message: Congratulations, you won! As a prize, you can have <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Simon_Prize> Scarabs<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_Restart.message: You're in the middle of a game! What do you want?<N>  <B 1> Quit<PC 1><B 2> Restart<N>  <B 3> Carry on<PC 1><B 4> Instructions<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_CopyLimit.message: Oh no you don't! You only get two views per sequence!<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_NoMoney.message: Wait, you don't have enough <FC 0,128,0>Scarabs<END FC>. Come back when you have enough to play.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_CantLeave.message: Hey, you can't leave! You're in the middle of a game!<E>

HT_Text_MG_Simon_GameComplete.message: Excellent! You've beaten my game and earned the <FC 0,128,0>Medal of Sequences<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_Start.message:
Welcome to my game! It costs 10 Scarabs to play.

Would you like to play? Yes No thanks

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_Scores.message: <DHP><DP><END TT>The fastest you've completed this game is:<N><FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Pairs_HighScore> seconds<END FC>.

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_NoScores.message: <DHP><DP><END TT>You've never completed this game... <END FC>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_Win.message: Congratulations! You've won <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Pairs_Won> Scarabs<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_Restart.message: You're in the middle of a game! What do you want?<N>  <B 1> Quit<PC 1><B 2> Restart<N>  <B 3> Carry on<PC 1><B 4> Instructions<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_Instructions.message:
Use your Blowpipe to shoot open the doors at the end of the room.

Match each pair of items behind the doors to win.

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_NoBlowpipe.message: Sorry, but you can't play unless you have a <FC 0,128,0>Blowpipe<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_RestartPay.message: It'll cost you another <FC 0,128,0>10 Scarabs<END FC>...<N>  <B 1> OK, restart<N>  <B 2> No, carry on playing<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_NoMoney.message: I said it'll cost <FC 0,128,0>10 Scarabs<END FC>, you don't have <FC 0,128,0>10 Scarabs<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_NotWon.message: That took you forever! No prize for you!<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_WinInstructions.message: If you can complete the game within <FC 0,128,0>60 seconds<END FC>, you will have proven yourself worthy of the <FC 0,128,0>Medal of Memory<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_GameComplete.message: And you've earned the <FC 0,128,0>Medal of Memory<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_MG_Pairs_TooLong.message: That's it, you're taking too long, I'm going to have to stop the game. Sorry.<E>

HT_Text_Museum_BC01_Giant_Prawn.message:
---[ Geb ]---

Sharing the name of the ancient earth-god, Gebs used to be peaceful creatures.

Nowadays, they are little more than obedient muscle for the fearsome Geb Queen...

HT_Text_Museum_BM09_Smiling_burble.message:
---[ Smiling Burble ]---

This little critter is one of the less harmful members of the Burble family, having lost the explosive properties indicative of its species.

Their powerful horns can shatter rock, although their lack of coordination lessens the threat this would normally pose.

HT_Text_Museum_BM10_i_Cyclops.message:
---[ Cyclops ]---

Named so for its single eye, this biped is capable of charging bolts of fire, teleportation and duplication.

Their combination of skin and hair colour has sometimes seen them confused with a certain root vegetable...

HT_Text_Museum_BM12_slim_burble.message:
---[ Slim Burble ]---

Sporting spindlier limbs when compared to other Burbles, the Slim Burble is capable of laying eggs with alarming frequency.

Living in warrens built at the base of cliff faces, its fiery temperament derives from a diet that primarily consists of freshly-flowing lava.

HT_Text_Museum_BR04_Goofy_Lizard.message:
---[ Goofy Lizard ]---

The Goofy Lizard's behaviour implies a complete lack of common sense, matched only by their apparent lack of coordination.

The most popular domesticated animal in existence.

HT_Text_Museum_BR05_Dino_Oaf.message:
---[ Dino Oaf ]---

Dino Oafs have been in existence for millions of years, as recently discovered cave etching attest to.

Docile and inquisitive herbivores, their strength is sometimes employed in assisting heavy farming tasks.

HT_Text_Museum_BR06_Half_Brute.message:
---[ Half Brute ]---

The name Half Brute understates the nature of these aggressive two-legged monsters, predominantly found in desert regions.

A descendant of the Full Brute; a despicable lizard now widely acknowledged to be extinct.

HT_Text_Museum_BU01_Mummy_Minotaur.message:
---[ Mummy Minotaur ]---

Descended from the keeper of an ancient maze, Mummy Minotaurs prowl the darkest temples of Egypt.

Consumed in flames which it can also breathe from its mouth, this fiery attack has been neutralized for the safety of the museum.

HT_Text_Museum_BU02_Skeletal_Axeman.message:
---[ Skeletal Axeman ]---

Rumoured to be former warriors of an ancient dark Egyptian army. Members of the undead, their origin is unknown.

Now rarely seen in groups larger than three, in the past they formed whole battalions.

HT_Text_Museum_BU03_zombie_man.message:
---[ Zombie ]---

Before entering the ranks of the undead, they were slaves who laboured long and hard building immense temples.

Now, a Zombie is doomed to wander the lands of sand, in search of a gateway to the afterlife that will forever elude them...

HT_Text_Museum_BU05_almost_a_bull.message:
---[ Almost-A-Bull ]---

Often found in Heliopolis, the Almost-A-Bull's defence mechanism sees it shrink in order to present a smaller target for any attacker.

A unique breeding mistake led to one hand being replaced with a third horn; almost an evolutionary anomaly.

HT_Text_Museum_BU06_MBird.message:
---[ Mummy Bird ]---

When mummified, bandages were wrapped around the Mummy Bird's eyes, to safeguard against superstition.

As a result, it relies on its sense of hearing to locate prey, leaping with claws extended in the approximate direction of the sound.

HT_Text_Museum_FL02_Featherless_Turkey.message:
---[ Featherless Turkey ]---

Specially bred to enable quick and simple food processing, over the years the Featherless Turkey has developed a complex.

They ram into anyone nearby, seemingly blaming everything living they come across for the loss of their plumage.

HT_Text_Museum_FL03_shuttlecock_bird.message:
---[ Shuttlecock Bird ]---

The Shuttlecock Bird may only be able to fly short distances at a time, but its one leg allows for some powerful hopping.

The unique arrangement of feathers around its head make it incredibly aerodynamic when lunging to attack.

HT_Text_Museum_HD02_Cat.message:
---[ Knives Cat ]---

A much faster and more deadly relative of the Crabhands. Possess a remarkable sense of hearing.

While humanoid in shape, you have only to see a Knives Cat hunting to appreciate where the feline half of its name comes from.

HT_Text_Museum_HD03_BigBull.message:
---[ Big Bull ]---

The hammer-wielding monstrosity is renowned for its bad temper.

Such is the size of its weapon, it acts as a shield without the need for a defensive pose.

HT_Text_Museum_HD14_Crab.message:
---[ Crabhands ]---

A combination of humanoid and shellfish makes up this monster, found throughout the land.

The gold armour plating adorning Crabhands is permanently welded to its body and enchanted to allow for growth.

HT_Text_Museum_HD17_Sharpbeak.message:
---[ Sharpbeak ]---

The Sharpbeak's slender form makes it a lithe warrior, and they are well trained in swordsmanship techniques.

Dark magic is rumoured to be the cause of this unusual blend of lizard and bird.

HT_Text_Museum_HD43_Skull_Aka_Worshipper.message:
---[ Skull Worshipper ]---

A powerful ally to the forces of evil - skilful and ruthless fighters.

The Skull Worshipper is precisely that - their dwellings are said to be adorned with skulls, by those who have lived to escape.

---[ Dark Worshipper ]---

Adventurers should approach the shadows of any dungeon with caution, for a Dark Worshipper may be lurking in the darkness.

Said to be the tortured souls of former warriors, trapped between our world and the afterlife.

---[ Skull Swordsman ]---

Highly trained in many swordsmanship techniques, and deadly opponents.

Proof that they dwell within evil, they can summon a ghostly skull, which drains the soul's essence on contact.

HT_Text_Museum_IN01_Green_Giant_worm.message:
---[ Green Giant Worm ]---

The largest invertebrate creature known, it is also one of the few carnivorous worms in existence.

Green Giant Worms uniquely fortify the entrances to their subterranean tunnel networks, affording some forewarning as to their presence.

HT_Text_Museum_IN07_Blade_Scorpion.message:
---[ Blade Scorpion ]---

This lobster-like arachnid has a very different jointed tail to the regular scorpion, with twice as much potential to harm.

As well as carrying a deadly sting at the tail's tip, the Blade Scorpion's tail itself is just that - a lethal, razor sharp blade capable of scything through armour.

HT_Text_Museum_IN09_Sak_Spike_Spider.message:
---[ Spike Spider ]---

Perhaps the smallest member of the spider family, it is swifter than most thanks to its strong legs.

The Spike Spider is a pack hunter, and in groups they will surround their prey and attack from all directions simultaneously.

HT_Text_Museum_PI01_Piranha.message:
---[ Piranha ]---

A vicious fish native to a strange and far off land, those found on this continent have the voracious appetite of their overseas counterparts, but are also amphibious.

Similar to rats; in recent years the Piranha has become an increasing hazard in larger towns.

HT_Text_Museum_PI01_Hard_Piranha.message:
---[ Exo-Piranha ]---

The Exo-Piranha's external skeleton makes them incredibly resilient.

Faster and more intelligent than other types of Piranha known, they are undeniably as ugly as the wounds they are known to inflict.

HT_Text_Museum_PL02_Tree_Creature.message:
---[ Tree Creature ]---

The Tree Creature is one of the few plants known to have magical abilities from birth.

It distracts any potential threat with a mesmerizing glow of light which emanates over its head, while underground roots rapidly burst through the ground to attack.

HT_Text_Museum_PL04_Sunflower_With_Face.message:
---[ Sunflower ]---

This perennial plant has been known to live for many centuries.

Immobile for most of the time, it springs to life when threatened and fires off three spore attacks simultaneously, to virtually guarantee harm befalls any potential threat.

HT_Text_Museum_QC01_Pokemon.message:
---[ Shell Critter ]---

A shy, herbivorous reptile renowned for spending most of its life retreated inside its shell.

Despite being fairly commonplace, excessive cruelty to Shell Critters has given them protected species status.

HT_Text_Museum_QR04_Sak_Nose_Needler.message:
---[ Nose Needler ]---

The Nose Needler certainly does needle, provoking their prey until its judgment is clouded by anger.

Burrowing through soft soil at great speed, they emerge briefly and throw abrasive rocks at an enemy, before going underground once again and repeating the process.

HT_Text_Museum_QU01_Skeletal_Spider.message:
---[ Skeletal Spider ]---

One of the most unique looking members of its species, the Skeletal Spider stands out with the unusual vertical growth of its spine.

Native to Uruk, where their fleshless bodies are little affected by the scorching heat.

HT_Text_Museum_QU02_Skeletal_Armadillo.message:
---[ Armadillo ]---

These peculiar, waddling quadrupeds normally walk along at a slow pace. Their hard shell doubles up as a weapon when spinning along the ground.

Certain popular children's tales claim their origins as the union of the hedgehog and tortoise.

HT_Text_Museum_QU04_Mummy_Chihuahua.message:
---[ Mummy Chihuahua ]---

A Chihuahua is a smooth-coated dog of diminutive stature. The mummification process makes their undead counterpart very aggressive.

A popular pet of a former Pharaoh, they went to the tomb with their master.

HT_Text_Museum_QU05_skeletal_waspspider.message:
---[ Wasp Spider ]---

One of the slower members of the spider family, the tips of their claws hold a powerful sting.

The Wasp Spider prefers the cool breezes found in coastal regions.

HT_Text_Museum_QU06_Mummy_Worm.message:
---[ Mummy Worm ]---

An undead invertebrate which spits out harmful balls of fire.

Rooted to the spot and unable to burrow, they are sometimes kept as sentries to ward off unwanted visitors.

HT_Text_Museum_QU09_Rat.message:
---[ Rat ]---

A large rodent well known for its ability to spread diseases, often found in sewers and other poorly sanitized areas.

The name "Rat" is also used to signify a treacherous or untrustworthy person.

HT_Text_Museum_PI04_Spinefish.message:
---[ Spinefish ]---

The Spinefish's deceptively beautiful display fins hide deadly poisonous spines which it uses to fend off would-be aggressors.

The Spinefish is an extremely territorial animal and is commonly used by the upper classes in their defensive moats.

HT_Text_Museum_PI02_Electric_Eel.message:
---[ Electric Eel ]---

The Electric Eel is quite a docile animal in its natural habitat.

However, due to the electric field it creates, any water in which it swims becomes electrified and very dangerous to unsuspecting animals.

HT_Text_Museum_PI03_Manta_Ray.message:
---[ Manta Ray ]---

The Manta Ray's natural habitat is the open ocean.

They usually prefer to prey upon small schools of fish but have been known to attack larger animals if provoked.

HT_Text_Museum_FL05_Mummy_Eagle.message:
---[ Mummy Eagle ]---

The Mummy Eagle is one of the biggest birds known to exist. Its great size and strength mean that it can easily pick up people.

This ability has been known to have been exploited by the Ancients, who used an Eagle Stone to summon the birds.

HT_Text_Museum_IN11_Spider.message:
---[ Alert Spider ]---

The Alert Spider spends its life above the ground climbing over walls or ceilings.

From this high vantage point, it is able to drop down onto unsuspecting prey without drawing attention to itself.

HT_Text_Museum_QR01_Cobra.message:
---[ Cobra ]---

A hooded and highly poisonous snake.

The cobra commonly makes its home in dark and secluded areas, surprising many unsuspecting explorers.

HT_Text_Museum_QR02_Spitting_Toad.message:
---[ Spitting Toad ]---

The so called "Spitting Toad" got its name from its tendency to swallow first, think later.

Anything that is not to the Toad's rather picky taste is spat out quite forcefully.

HT_Text_Museum_QR03_Small_Frog.message:
---[ Small Frog ]---

The Small Frog originates from the toxic swamplands.

As a result, it is very resistant to toxic substances.

HT_Text_Museum_QU08_Normal_Chihuahua.message:
---[ Chihuahua ]---

A favourite pet of the rich, Chihuahuas are very energetic.

While the dog-loving community adore Chihuahuas, most find their incessant yapping highly irritating.

HT_Text_Museum_PI05_Aka_Turtle.message:
---[ Sea Turtle ]---

The Sea Turtle is a solitary creature fond of the open ocean. Its large size is a result of its immense lifespan.

The oldest Sea Turtle to have been found was aged in excess of three centuries.

HT_Text_Museum_BM07_Squirt.message:
---[ Squirt ]---

The Squirt is a shy, easily frightened creature. The high value of the Squirt comes as a result of being immune to Capture Beetles.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BM09_Smiling_burble.message: A Smiling Burble! Uses its horns in a haphazard manner.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BM10_i_Cyclops.message: A Cyclops! Cute looking but very mischievous.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BM12_slim_burble.message: A Slim Burble! A quick breeder, and explosive too!

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BR04_Goofy_Lizard.message: A Goofy Lizard! It’s a daft but friendly animal.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BR06_Half_Brute.message: A Half Brute! A shockingly aggressive monster.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BU02_Skeletal_Axeman.message: A Skeletal Axeman! Lethal foot soldier from the dark side.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BU05_almost_a_bull.message: Almost-A-Bull! Uses its horns to violent effect.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_BU06_MBird.message: A Mummy Bird! Bandages cover most of its feathers.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_FL02_Featherless_Tur.message: A Featherless Turkey! A bald bird with a grumpy attitude.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_FL03_shuttlecock_bir.message: A Shuttlecock Bird! One-legged with aerodynamic plumage.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_HD02_Cat.message: A Knives Cat! Not the friendliest feline around.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_HD03_BigBull.message: A Big Bull! Partial to swinging his hammer around.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_HD14_Crab.message: A Crabhands! A biped with a grumpy temperament.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_HD17_Sharpbeak.message: A Sharpbeak! A rare specimen of this battling creature.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_HD43_Skull_Aka_Worsh.message: A Skull Worshipper! A powerful ally to the forces of evil.
A Dark Worshipper! Rarely seen outside the shadows.
A Skull Swordsman! Skilful warriors with ghostly attacks.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_IN01_Green_Giant_wor.message: Green Giant Worm! A big worm with big teeth.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_IN07_Blade_Scorpion.message: A Blade Scorpion! Fast and deadly with a stinging tail.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_IN09_Sak_Spike_Spide.message: A Spike Spider! Well known for dropping on their prey.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_PI01_Hard_Piranha.message: An Exo-Piranha! Quick and deadly little fish.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_PL02_Tree_Creature.message: A Tree Creature! Don’t seek shade under this tree!

HT_Text_Museum_Name_PL04_Sunflower_With_.message: A Sunflower! A dangerous spore-firing plant.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QC01_Pokemon.message: A Shell Critter! A timid little shelled reptile.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QR04_Sak_Nose_Needle.message: A Nose Needler! A feisty subterranean mammal.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QU01_Skeletal_Spider.message: A Skeletal Spider! Head butts enemies into submission.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QU04_Mummy_Chihuahua.message: A Mummy Chihuahua! A pet that’s now undead.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QU04_Normal_Chihuahu.message: A Chihuahua! A popular pet amongst the rich.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QU05_skeletal_waspsp.message: A Wasp Spider! Known for its nasty sting.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QU06_Mummy_Worm.message: A Mummy Worm! Spits fireballs to ward off attackers.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QU09_Rat.message: A Rat! A dirty creature that scuttles around.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QU02_Skeletal_Armadi.message: An Electric Armadillo! The most shocking of its species.
A Fire Armadillo! Spins around with scorching results.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QR01_Cobra.message: A Cobra! A hooded snake with a venomous bite.

HT_Text_Museum_Name_QR03_Small_Frog.message: A Small Frog! It’s certainly small, but also toxic.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotAbyCrown.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Abydos<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotSakCrown.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Uruk<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHelCrown.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Heliopolis<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_NewNoteFirst.message:
A new note has been added tothe Book of Sphinx!

To view the Book of Sphinxpress

The Notes section containsimportant information about your quest.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_NewNote.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>A new note has been added to<N>the <FC 0,128,0>Book of Sphinx<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_NewNotes.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>New notes have been added to<N>the <FC 0,128,0>Book of Sphinx<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotChapter2Items.message:
You got the items that the Mummycollected in the Castle of Uruk...

You got the Atun Statue!

This golden effigy is said to have magical powers.

You got the second Stolen Abydos Jewel!

The curators of Abydos Museumwill be very pleased to see this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotChapter3Items.message:
You got the items that the Mummycollected in the Castle of Uruk...

You got the Medicine Bag!

This specially lined bag will preserve anydelicate medicinal ingredients placed inside.

You got the third Stolen Abydos Jewel!

The curators of Abydos Museumwill be very pleased to see this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotChapter4Items.message:
You got the items that the Mummycollected in the Castle of Uruk...

You got the Hands of Amun!

This artifact gives Sphinx the strength topush and pull extremely heavy objects.

You got the fourth Stolen Abydos Jewel!

The curators of Abydos Museumwill be very pleased to see this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotChapter5Items.message:
You got the items that the Mummycollected in the Castle of Uruk...

You got the Royal Invitation!

This official document invites you tomeet with the Pharaoh of Heliopolis.

You got the fifth Stolen Abydos Jewel!

The curators of Abydos Museumwill be very pleased to see this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotChapter6Items.message:
You got the items that the Mummycollected in the Castle of Uruk...

You got the Sacred Crown of Set!

You got the sixth Stolen Abydos Jewel!

The curators of Abydos Museumwill be very pleased to see this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_AtunDisc.message:
This is an ancient Atun Disc!

It is a magical point which, when passed over, imbues a mysterious energy that enables you to run at very high speed.

Unfortunately the effect is only temporary but they should prove invaluable for getting around Heliopolis more efficiently.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotAtunEye.message:
You found an Atun Eye!

It looks like it would fit into the eyesocket of a statue of some kind.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotAtunEyes04.message:
You got 4 Atun Eyes!

They look like they would fit into the eyesockets of a statue of some kind.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotDoubleJump.message:
You got the Wings of Ibis!

With this magical artifact, Sphinx canperform a second jump to reach greaterheights and longer distances!

Press to jump,then press again in mid airto SOMERSAULT.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotShieldOfOsiris.message:
You got the Shield of Osiris!

This magical shield was used in battleby the great god Osiris himself.

You can use the shield to protect yourself frommany types of enemy attacks and other hazards.

To equip the Shield of Osiris use to select the item...

...then press the button youwant to assign the item to.

Once assigned press and hold theappropriate button to defend yourself.

While defending yourself, use to aim the shield.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotBlowpipe.message:
You got the Blowpipe!

The magical darts fired from this powerful tool,regenerate giving you an infinite supply.

The darts can be used to hit remote targets but theyare only powerful enough to damage explosive monsters.

Use to assign the Blowpipe to a button.

Once the Blowpipe is assigned, pressthe button to enter first person mode.

Press to fire.

Press to exitfrom Blowpipe mode.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHandsOfAmun.message:
You got the Hands Of Amun!

This artifact gives Sphinx the strength topush and pull extremely heavy objects.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotMummyCash.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Mum_CashCollected> Onyx Scarabs<END FC> that<N>the Mummy collected in the <FC 128,64,0>Castle of Uruk<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotBeetlePouch.message:
You got the Beetle Pouch!

This pouch enables you to carry up to20 Capture Beetles, which can be usedto capture many different kinds of monster.

To capture a monster, you must first attack it untilit becomes vulnerable to capture. When this is the case,it will flash yellow in colour.

Once the monster is vulnerable, release a capture beetle. Guide the beetle into the monster using .

When the beetle collides with the monster it will be captured and added to your inventory!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotScarabPurseUpgrade01.message:
You got the Large Scarab Bag!

You can now carry up to 900 Scarabs!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotBeetleSatchel.message:
You got the Beetle Satchel!

You can now carry up to 50 Capture Beetles!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotDartBelt.message:
You got the Dart Belt!

You can now carry up to 50 darts of each type!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotAnkhPiece.message:
You got a Gold Ankh Piece!

Collect four of these and a person with the rightskills will be able to increase your health capacity.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotAnkhContainer.message:
You got a Gold Ankh!

This magic artifact has increased your health capacityby 1 Ankh and has fully replenished your health!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Got100Scarabs.message:
You got 100 Gold Scarabs!

Don't spend them all at once!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotIceDarts.message:
You got some Ice Darts!

These magical darts can be usedto freeze certain types of monster.

Once a monster is frozen, you can push or pick upthe block of ice depending on its size.

You can also stand on top of the block of iceto reach an otherwise inaccessible area.

Alternatively, you can shatter the blockby hitting it with your blade.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotAcidDarts.message:
You got some Acid Darts!

These magically corrosive darts can be used to dissolve certain metal chains!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHippyItem.message:
You got a Parasol!

This looks perfect for providing shadeon hot sunny days.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotBeetleBreederItem.message:
You got the Beetle Breeding Jar!

The Beetle Breeder in the Bedouin Outpostwill be very pleased to see this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotUnderwaterProjectile.message:
You got the Underwater Projectiles!

You can use these to hit targets andcertain monsters while swimming underwater!

Simply press while underwaterto fire a projectile in the direction you are facing.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotFastSwim.message:
You got the Crocodile Scales!

This ancient artifact allows you toswim under water at great speed!

Press while under waterto swim with gusto!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_FoundGoldKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found a <FC 0,128,0>Gold Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_FoundGlyphKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found a <FC 0,128,0>Glyph Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_FoundCanopicVase.message:
You got a Canopic Vase!

Part of the soul of Tutankhamenis stored inside.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_FoundRosettaStonePiece.message:
You found a Rosetta Stone Piece!

The Archaeologist will be very interested in this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHeliopolisGateKey01.message:
You got the South Desert Key!

This opens a gate leading tothe South Desert of Heliopolis!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHeliopolisGateKey02.message:
You got the Obelisk Gate Key!

This opens a gate leading tothe Great Obelisk of Heliopolis!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHeliopolisGateKey03.message:
You got the Cave Door Key!

This opens a stone door in a cave betweenHeliopolis Point and South Beach!

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotPhysiciansNote.message:
You got the Physician's Note!

It is addressed to Kemmet the Inventorwho lives in Abydos Canal.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHealingHerb.message:
You got a Healing Herb!

The Physician in Abydos Council Chamberswill be most pleased to see this.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotAtunStatue.message:
You got the Atun Statue!

This golden effigy is said to have magical powers.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotHathorStatue.message:
You got the Hathor Statue!

This golden effigy is said to have magical powers.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotMedicineBag.message:
You got the Medicine Bag!

This specially lined bag will preserve anydelicate medicinal ingredients placed inside.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotEagleStone.message:
You got the Eagle Stone!

This charmed stone allows you to summona Great Eagle when stood on special points.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotWallSection2Key.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got a <FC 0,128,0>Great Wall Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotWallSection3Key.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got a <FC 0,128,0>Great Wall Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_NoBookOfDead.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>Without the <FC 0,128,0>Book of the Dead<END FC> you are unable to summon Bas-Ket to transport the <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vase<END FC> to the Mummy.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_NoHandsOfAmun.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>This object is much too heavy for you to move.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_UseItem_NoItem01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>There is a recess for an item of some kind.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_UseItem_NoItem02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>A <FC 0,128,0>key<END FC> is needed to activate this device.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_UseItem_NoItem03.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>An image of a large bird is painted on this structure.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_UseItem_NoItem04.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>The eye socket of this stone statue is empty.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_UseItem_InvalidItem01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>That item cannot be used here.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_UseItem_InvalidItem03.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>That <FC 0,128,0>Curse Stone<END FC> is the wrong colour.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotCurseStones01.message:
You got 2 Curse Stones!

Each magic stone has the power to lift the cursefrom one inhabitant of the Cursed Palace.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotCurseStones02.message:
You got 2 Curse Stones!

Each magic stone has the power to lift the cursefrom one inhabitant of the Cursed Palace.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotCurseStones03.message:
You got 3 Curse Stones!

Each magic stone has the power to lift the cursefrom one inhabitant of the Cursed Palace.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotPortalAmuletLuxor01.message:
You got a Mysterious Amulet!

The strange symbols on this ancient artifactindicate transport to a mysterious location.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotPortalAmuletAbydos01.message:
You got the Abydos Amulet!

The oceanic symbols on this ancientartifact indicate transport to Abydos.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotPortalAmuletHeliopol.message:
You got the Heliopolis Amulet!

The sand etched symbols on this ancient artifact indicate transport to Heliopolis.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotPortalAmuletDarkArea.message:
You got the Anubis Amulet!

The symbols on this ancient artifactindicate transport to Anubis Tower.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_HaveAmulet.message: Show me your <FC 0,128,0>Portal Amulet<END FC>, small one, and I shall open the gates to your destiny.<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_NoAmulet.message: Why do you summon me, strange creature? Without a <FC 0,128,0>Portal Amulet<END FC> I cannot allow you to pass.<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AlreadyHere.message: What foolishness do you request of me? You are already here.<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletAcceptedLu.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and<N>will provide transport to a <FC 128,64,0>Mysterious Location<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletAcceptedAb.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and<N>will provide transport to <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletAcceptedAk.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and<N>will provide transport to <FC 128,64,0>Akaria<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletAcceptedHe.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and<N>will provide transport to <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletAcceptedSa.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and will provide transport to <FC 128,64,0>Sakkara<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletAcceptedUr.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and will provide transport to the <FC 128,64,0>Castle of Uruk<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletAcceptedDa.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and<N>will provide transport to <FC 128,64,0>Anubis Tower<END FC>...<E>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your offering and will provide transport to <FC 128,64,0>Uruk Valley<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletDeniedLuxo.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God is amused at your foolishness.<N>You are already in a <FC 128,64,0>Mysterious Location<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletDeniedAbyd.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God is amused at your foolishness.<N>You are already in <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletDeniedHeli.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God is amused at your foolishness.<N>You are already in <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletDeniedDark.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>The Portal God is amused at your foolishness.<N>You are already in <FC 128,64,0>Anubis Tower<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_Portal_AmuletDenied01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>The Portal God will not allow you to pass at this time...<E>

HT_Text_Gen_Help_UseItem_NoItem05.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>A <FC 0,128,0>Key<END FC> is needed to open this door.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Sewer_King_Challenge1.message: Light all of these torches around me and I will give you this ancient artifact. Be careful though; it's just as easy to extinguish them as it is to light them.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter1_FoundQuestItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Wings of Ibis<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter2_FoundQuestItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Atun Statue<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter3_FoundQuestItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Medicine Bag<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter4_FoundQuestItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Hands of Amun<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter5_FoundQuestItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Royal Invitation<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter1_FoundJewel1.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the first <FC 0,128,0>Stolen Abydos Jewel<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><W 90>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter2_FoundJewel2.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the second <FC 0,128,0>Stolen Abydos Jewel<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter3_FoundJewel3.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the third <FC 0,128,0>Stolen Abydos Jewel<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter4_FoundJewel4.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the fourth <FC 0,128,0>Stolen Abydos Jewel<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter5_FoundJewel5.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the fifth <FC 0,128,0>Stolen Abydos Jewel<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Chapter6_FoundJewel6.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the sixth <FC 0,128,0>Stolen Abydos Jewel<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Aby_Canal_GotStairsKey.message:
You got the Stairs Key!

Use it to open the stairs to the well area balcony.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotZipHandle.message:
You got the Zip Line Handle!

You can now use the zip lines in Abydosto get around the city.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotParasol.message:
You got the Parasol!

It's great for those hot sunny days.

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_Urukite1.message: Go away, evil creature!!! Set can kill me but he's not going to steal my soul! <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_Urukite2.message: Why are you freeing me? Who are you? You don't want to kill me? <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_Urukite3.message: Hmm... you don't look so frightening outside of the cage... Why are you helping me? <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_Urukite4.message:
They say that I have stolen jewels from the castle, but I never did it!

My name is Khensu. I'm an Urukite. We were the habitants of this region before Set appeared. Our numbers are few, hidden in the castle trying to survive.

We've avoided Set until now because we know the region better, but that won't last long. In the end he will find us, if someone doesn't help.

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_Urukite5.message: Anyway, we can't remain in this room for long. Set's guards could come at any moment. Follow me. I will help you escape from this cell. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_Urukite6.message: This secret door connects with other sections of the castle. We must separate now. It is too risky for us to stay together. Good luck. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_CageLocked.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>This cage requires a <FC 0,128,0>Key<END FC> to open.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Cast_Help_FoundCageKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found a <FC 0,128,0>Cage Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E><W 30>
